inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Primary Myelofibrosis (PMF), Post-Polycythemia Vera Myelofibrosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must score at least 2 points on the Dynamic International Prognostic Scoring System (DIPSS) scale for prognostic risk factors.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Peripheral blast count < 5% at both Screening and Baseline hematology assessments.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must discontinue all drugs used to treat underlying myelofibrosis (MF) disease no later than Day -1 (the day prior to starting ruxolitinib).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must have hemoglobin value ≥ 6.5 g/dL and be willing to receive blood transfusions.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Invasive malignancies over the previous 5 years (except treated early stage carcinomas of the skin, completely resected intraepithelial carcinoma of the cervix, and completely resected papillary thyroid and follicular thyroid cancers).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Splenic irradiation within 6 months prior to receiving the first dose of study medication.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has no other underlying disease and is not on any medications.
